description:
This idyllic home situated in the leafy surrounds of Eynesbury is the perfect opportunity for first home buyers, downsizers, or investors to purchase in the picturesque township of Eynesbury with all the benefits of a rural lifestyle experience and the convenience of Melbourne CBD only 38km (approx.) away.

Stylishly combining country character with contemporary additions, this spacious four-bedroom home features a master suite with walk-in robe and en-suite, while the remining three bedrooms are spacious in size and feature carpet, built in robes and plenty of natural light.

A well-appointed kitchen adjoins the main living and dining area and features a wealth of cupboard and bench space with a beautiful suite of quality fixtures and fittings including a stainless-steel oven/rangehood and dishwasher.
Stepping outside beyond glass sliding doors to the alfresco, you have a delightful retreat to enjoy the serenity the backyard and surrounding area or entertain friends and family.

Further features of this home include, high ceilings, ducted heating and split system cooling, exposed aggregate driveway, remote control double car garage with internal and external access, quality window furnishing, spacious laundry with separate access to outside.

Exquisitely presented, this outstanding home does not compromise when it comes to effortless family living and is perfectly situated within minutes to the Eynesbury Primary and Pre-School, Sporting Ovals, Dog Park and soon to be constructed Town Centre. Please call us for more information!

DISCLAIMER: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor/ agent and agency.
